price: Na bila ya shaka tuliiacha iwe ni Ishara. Lakini je, yupo anaye kumbuka?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
footnotes: Na tumeliacha hilo tukio na kuzamishwa makafiri na kuokolewa Waumini liwe ni mawaidha, lakini yupo mwenye kuwaidhika?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
